Author: GitHub
Description:
Tired of upload limits and privacy concerns when converting files? Meet Vert, an open source file converter that runs entirely on your machine using WebAssembly. Learn how this tool lets you convert over 250 formats directly in your browser without ever sending data to a cloud server.

#Vert #FileConverter #OpenSource

Title: Meet Vert: the open source file converter that stays local
